channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket

item.title: Trump says plan to make U.S. 'crypto capital of the planet' coming within hours
item.description: Trump told his 90 million followers on X that he will lay out "a plan to ensure the United States will be the crypto capital of the planet" later on T...

item.title: What to expect on markets after Fed-preferred inflation update Friday
Gap shares halted after apparent early earnings release
item.description: Gap shares were halted after the apparent early release of its earnings, which are due after the closing bell Thursday.

item.title: Gap share trading reportedly halted for pending news

item.title: U.S. pending home sales drop to an all-time low
Salesforce up and Nvidia lower? It feels like opposite day on Wall Street
item.description: The stock market looks upside down right now.

item.title: German inflation rate falls to its lowest level since early 2021
German inflation posts surprise drop to 2% in August
item.description: The harmonzied German consumer price index eased to 2% in August, the statistics office Destatis said Thursday.
